title: Correction: Phylosymbiosis: Relationships and Functional Effects of Microbial Communities across Host Evolutionary History
fullText: Fig 4 is incorrect. The authors have provided a corrected version which corrects the connecting lines in panels D and E. The figure legend and conclusion remain the same.
